title: LINE Corporation : consolidated revenue 2013 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in the y axis.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
Quarter Q2 '13 has 7.41 times less Revenue in billion Japanese yen than Quarter Q4 '19 which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion Japanese yen for 27 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion Japanese yen for 27 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
The difference of Revenue in billion Japanese yen between the highest and lowest Quarter is 52.6.
The Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Revenue in billion Japanese yen, followed by Q4 '18, and Q4 '18. Down to the Quarter Q2 '13 which is the lowest.
Over the past 27 Quarters, the Revenue in billion Japanese yen has lowered.
Similar Revenue in billion Japanese yen is found in Quarter Q3 '19, and Q4 '18.
The Quarter Q2 '13 has 1.65 times less Revenue in billion Japanese yen than average.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 993.5.
